newsitem.title: ARGENTINA: Argentine evangelist arrested in baby's death.
newsitem.headline: Argentine evangelist arrested in baby's death.

text.p: An Argentine evangelist preacher and his wife were arrested Thursday on charges of killing their baby by beating it to death, police said.

Police investigating the death in hospital last year of a two-year-old baby from broken bones, bruising and malnutrition arrested the 38-year-old preacher and his Paraguayan wife, 26, in the working class Buenos Aires suburb of Lanus.

"From what we have been told, every time the man beat his wife and child he shouted the name of God and believed himself to be a divine messenger," local news agencies quoted police as saying. "He shouted 'Evil shall not live on!'."
The preacher and his Paraguayan wife were being held in Lanus police station on homicide charges.
